org.apache.storm.cassandra

インタフェース ExecutionResultHandler

  • すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    Serializable
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    AbstractExecutionResultHandler, BaseExecutionResultHandler

    public interface ExecutionResultHandler
extends Serializable

    Default interface to define strategies to apply when a query is either succeed or failed.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void onQuerySuccess(OutputCollector collector, Tuple tuple)
      Invoked when a query is executed with success.
      void onQueryValidationException(com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.QueryValidationException e, OutputCollector collector, Tuple tuple)
      Invoked when a QueryValidationException is thrown.
      void onReadTimeoutException(com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.ReadTimeoutException e, OutputCollector collector, Tuple tuple)
      Invoked when a ReadTimeoutException is thrown.
      void onThrowable(Throwable t, OutputCollector collector, List<Tuple> tl)
      Default method used to handle any type of exception.
      void onThrowable(Throwable t, OutputCollector collector, Tuple i)
      Default method used to handle any type of exception.
      void onUnavailableException(com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.UnavailableException e, OutputCollector collector, Tuple tuple)
      Invoked when a UnavailableException is thrown.
      void onWriteTimeoutException(com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.WriteTimeoutException e, OutputCollector collector, Tuple tuple)
      Invoked when a WriteTimeoutException is thrown.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • onQueryValidationException

        void onQueryValidationException(com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.QueryValidationException e,
                                OutputCollector collector,
                                Tuple tuple)

        Invoked when a QueryValidationException is thrown.

        パラメータ:
        e - the cassandra exception.
        collector - the storm collector.
        tuple - an input tuple.

      • onReadTimeoutException

        void onReadTimeoutException(com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.ReadTimeoutException e,
                            OutputCollector collector,
                            Tuple tuple)

        Invoked when a ReadTimeoutException is thrown.

        パラメータ:
        e - the cassandra exception.
        collector - the storm collector.
        tuple - an input tuple.

      • onWriteTimeoutException

        void onWriteTimeoutException(com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.WriteTimeoutException e,
                             OutputCollector collector,
                             Tuple tuple)

        Invoked when a WriteTimeoutException is thrown.

        パラメータ:
        e - the cassandra exception.
        collector - the storm collector.
        tuple - an input tuple.

      • onUnavailableException

        void onUnavailableException(com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.UnavailableException e,
                            OutputCollector collector,
                            Tuple tuple)

        Invoked when a UnavailableException is thrown.

        パラメータ:
        e - the cassandra exception.
        collector - the storm collector.
        tuple - an input tuple.

      • onQuerySuccess

        void onQuerySuccess(OutputCollector collector,
                    Tuple tuple)

        Invoked when a query is executed with success. This method is NOT responsible for acknowledging input tuple.

        パラメータ:
        collector - the storm collector.
        tuple - an input tuple.

      • onThrowable

        void onThrowable(Throwable t,
                 OutputCollector collector,
                 Tuple i)

        Default method used to handle any type of exception.

        パラメータ:
        t - the thrown exception
        collector - the storm collector.
        i - an input tuple.

      • onThrowable

        void onThrowable(Throwable t,
                 OutputCollector collector,
                 List<Tuple> tl)

        Default method used to handle any type of exception.

        パラメータ:
        t - the thrown exception
        collector - the storm collector.
        tl - a list of input tuple.
